name: Sorting Things: Competition
description:
Find and merge similar things, — Combine unique boosters, Score points, and Win. A new simple fun puzzle game.

Includes tournaments and head-to-head competitions with real cash prizes (where available).

Your speed goes a long way!

- In our timed game, every decision matters. You get 4 minutes for each match to see how many points you can get.

- Find and merge things quickly to charge the score multiplier

- Use unique boosters wisely to multiply your points.

The game can be played Head to Head with other players or in multiplayer tournaments.

Challenge people around the world with Skill®, a competition platform complete with leaderboards, trophies, physical or virtual prizes, and an amazing loyalty program that rewards you for playing!

Enter the league for guaranteed prizes! Collect tickets and Zs to keep rising up the tiers to become a Chain master!

Sorting Things features:

- Find and merge things from a huge heap

- Unique boosters with which you will quickly come to victory

- Score multiplier that depends on your speed


Still, think it sounds simple? Why not give it a go? Prove that you are the best at sorting things!
